name: Simple Water Spinach and Garlic Stir Fry (Rau Muong Xao Toi)
description: Tossed in garlic and oyster sauce, this classic Vietnamese vegetable side dish goes wonderfully with steamed rice.
keywords: water spinach recipe, morning glory recipe, rau muong, on choy, rau muong recipe, on choy recipe, water spinach stir fry recipe, morning glory garlic stir fry, Vietnamese water spinach, Vietnamese water spinach recipe, simple water spinach and garlic stir fry, stir fried water spinach with garlic, stir fried water spinach recipe with garlic, water spinach tossed with garlic recipe, how to make rau muong stir fry, how to make Vietnamese rau muong stir fry, stir-fried water spinach, stir-fried morning glory, stir-fried on choy, rau muong xao toi, rau muống, rau muống xào, rau muống xào tỏi, rau muong xao toi

video.name: Stir Fried Water Spinach with Garlic (Rau Muống Xào Tỏi)
video.description: Stir Fried Water Spinach with Garlic (Rau Muống Xào Tỏi)

recipeInstructions: Before you unwrap the rubber band and plastic bag that it comes in, trim about 1 inch off the fibrous ends with a knife. One by one, hand snap the water spinach with your fingertips into 5-inch segments or smaller, depending on the size of your cooi Separate the stems from the leaves, as they require a bit more cooking, but this is entirely optional. Wash the water spinach thoroughly by soaking them in a large tub of cold water. Make sure to lift the water spinach out of the water each time to leave sand and dirt at the bottom. Repeat if necessary.
In a small bowl, mix together oyster sauce, sugar, and cornstarch. Set aside.

In a large skillet with a lid, heat oil on medium-high. Add garlic and pan fry until fragrant (about 5 Seconds). Add water spinach stems and pan fry for about 30 Seconds. Add water spinach leaves and a splash of water (about 2 tablespoons). Cover and let it steam for 2 minutes. Avoid overcooking to prevent a slimy texture and dull green color.
Uncover. Add sauce. Lightly toss water until evenly coated with oyster sauce. Serve immediately for best results.
